name: The Evening Post
description:
This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

Can you handle an out of control newsroom?

As the editor of the Evening Post, you get to decide what the public knows. Is that bizarre story about unicorns worth following, or would people rather just think about going on holiday? Guided by the notes in your diary (or not), select the best of a bad bunch of headlines and see the consequences written out before you by one or other of those incompetent journalists...
